p.d: Lili tries to find out who followed her into the forest, the evening before, and makes a series of surprising discoveries. Clara goes to check that Pascal is still in hospital and comes across William. Félicia, who's being bullied by the village youngsters, decides to take things in hand. Directed by: Charles-Olivier Michaud (season 1, Canada, 2016) Screenplay: Patrick Lowe, Estelle Bouchard, Charles-Olivier Michaud Cast: Pascale Bussieres (Clara Jacob), Sophie Desmarais (Liliane Jacob), Jade Charbonneau (Félicia Jacob), MikhaIl Ahooja (Arnaud Jacob), Benoît Gouin (Jules Samson), Éric Bruneau (Pascal Deraspe), Liam Patenaude (Romain Jacib) Genre: drama Parental guidance: TV-PG
